description: Defines the NotesState class, a state management component for handling notes in a Flutter application. It manages a list of notes, loading state, and interactions with a NoteRepository for CRUD operations and search functionality.

classes.name: NotesState
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier subclass managing notes state, providing methods for refreshing, adding, updating, deleting, and searching notes.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches all notes from the repository and updates the internal list; manages loading state.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new note via the repository, then refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note via the repository, then refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a note by id via the repository, then refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search query on notes via the repository and updates the internal list accordingly.
